text: Ivanhoe is a historical romantic novel set around the reign of Richard I of England. It was written by Scottish author Walter Scott. It was first printed in 1820. A 1952 movie version of the story starred Robert Taylor, Elizabeth Taylor, and Joan Fontaine. ==Other websites== * Online edition of Ivanhoe Category:British novels Category:1820s books Category:Robin Hood Category:Historical novels
title: Ivanhoe
